name: My Lost Crystal Eye
description:
"My Lost Crystal Eye" is a puzzle-platformer about a creature that can throw his eye to see places out of its reach.

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2021 in under 48h.

Credits: 

Aivaras Klimas - Art, Narrative, Design

Vidas Masteika - Animations, Sound, Design

Elvinas Žukauskas - Lead Programmer

Savelij Ognev - Programmer, Level Design
